parameters.description: Log reproduction rate for COTS (year^-1); exp(log_r_COTS) gives reproduction rate.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Crown of Thorns starfish population reproduction rate dynamics

parameters.description: Log mortality rate for COTS (year^-1); exp(log_m_COTS) gives mortality rate.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Crown of Thorns starfish mortality and population decline mechanisms

parameters.description: Log intrinsic growth rate for slow coral (year^-1); exp(log_growth_slow) gives growth rate.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Slow-growing coral species intrinsic growth and recovery potential

parameters.description: Log intrinsic growth rate for fast coral (year^-1); exp(log_growth_fast) gives growth rate.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Fast-growing coral species resilience and regeneration capacity

parameters.description: Log carrying capacity for slow coral; exp(log_K_slow) gives the carrying capacity (coral cover units).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Slow coral ecosystem maximum sustainable population and habitat capacity

parameters.description: Log carrying capacity for fast coral; exp(log_K_fast) gives the carrying capacity (coral cover units).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Fast coral ecosystem maximum sustainable population and habitat capacity

parameters.description: Log half-saturation constant for coral predation effects; exp(log_half_sat) gives the threshold used in the sigmoidal (Type III) response.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Sigmoidal functional response threshold for coral predation, capturing low predation efficiency at low coral densities and heightened predation as coral cover increases

parameters.description: Log environmental modifier (unitless) affecting COTS reproduction efficiency; exp(log_env) gives multiplier.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Environmental factors influencing Crown of Thorns starfish reproduction

parameters.description: Log standard deviation for COTS observations; exp(log_sd_COTS) gives standard deviation.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Measurement uncertainty and variability in Crown of Thorns observations

parameters.description: Log standard deviation for slow coral observations; exp(log_sd_slow) gives standard deviation.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Measurement uncertainty in slow-growing coral population assessments

parameters.description: Log standard deviation for fast coral observations; exp(log_sd_fast) gives standard deviation.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Measurement uncertainty in fast-growing coral population assessments

parameters.description: Log sensitivity of COTS reproduction to previous sea-surface temperature anomaly; exp(log_sst_sensitivity) multiplies the deviation from a 26Â°C baseline.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Modulates the effect of sea-surface temperature anomalies on COTS reproduction rates, capturing episodic outbreak dynamics

parameters.description: Log sensitivity of coral growth rate to deviations in sea-surface temperature from the optimum (26Â°C).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Captures reduced coral growth when temperatures deviate from the optimum (26Â°C).

parameters.description: Optimal sea-surface temperature for coral growth.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Represents the temperature at which coral growth is maximized.

parameters.description: Log sensitivity of COTS reproduction to deviations in sea-surface temperature from the optimum (opt_temp_COTS).
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Captures the non-linear effect of temperature on COTS reproduction, triggering outbreak events when optimal conditions are met.

parameters.description: Optimal sea-surface temperature for triggering COTS reproductive outbreak.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Represents the temperature at which COTS reproduction is maximized, contributing to outbreak events.

parameters.description: Log self-limiting term for COTS, representing density-dependent intraspecific competition that dampens outbreak magnitude at high population levels.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Models increased competition and resource limitation in high-density COTS populations, reducing explosive growth.

parameters.description: Log threshold for Allee effect in COTS reproduction; exp(log_allee_threshold) gives the minimum COTS density required for effective mate-finding and reproduction.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Represents a critical density threshold below which COTS reproduction is limited, capturing mate-finding Allee effects that trigger outbreak events above threshold.

parameters.description: Log flexible exponent for predation response on coral; exp(log_pred_exponent) adjusts sensitivity of predation to coral cover, capturing threshold effects.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Allows the predation rate on coral to vary non-linearly with coral cover, enabling better capture of threshold dynamics in COTS outbreaks.

parameters.description: Log half-saturation constant for predation on coral; exp(log_half_sat_pred) defines the coral density at which COTS predation efficiency saturates, independent from reproduction dynamics.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Introduces a separate saturating effect for the COTS predation functional response, allowing independent tuning of coral predation dynamics during outbreaks.

parameters.description: Log skew parameter for COTS temperature sensitivity asymmetry. Values >0 indicate a sharper decline in reproduction with temperatures above the optimum relative to below.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Introduces asymmetry in the temperature-dependent reproduction of COTS, capturing differential effects of temperature deviations above vs below the optimum

parameters.description: Log parameter for additional non-linear sensitivity of coral growth to temperature deviations. exp(log_temp_poly) scales the effect of temperature deviation on reducing coral growth, capturing sharper declines during extreme thermal events.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Introduces a polynomial modifier to the coral temperature sensitivity, enhancing the decline in growth as deviation from optimal increases

parameters.description: Log cross-species competition coefficient; exp(log_beta) represents the strength of interspecific competition (resource limitation) between slow and fast corals.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Represents the competition for space and nutrients between slow and fast coral, influencing system dynamics by indirectly modulating predation on corals during COTS outbreaks.

parameters.description: Log damage scaling parameter for slow coral due to cumulative predation effects; lower values imply higher damage effects. Now applied non-linearly as the squared ratio of COTS density to coral carrying capacity, capturing catastrophic coral loss at high COTS levels.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Introduces a non-linear feedback mechanism for cumulative tissue damage in slow coral by squaring the relative COTS density, better capturing the threshold behavior and catastrophic coral loss during outbreaks.

parameters.description: Log Allee threshold for coral recovery; exp(log_allee_coral) gives the critical coral cover below which coral recruitment is suppressed due to recruitment limitations.
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Captures reduced coral recruitment and delayed recovery when coral cover falls below a critical threshold, reflecting Allee effects in coral larval settlement and mate finding.
